thing-type.label: ES-61 Smoke Sensor
thing-type.description: Smoke Sensor<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtES61 is a battery powered independent photoelectric smoke sensor, mainly used for detecting surrounding smoke concentration. It will make loud audio alert when the concentration exceeds its alarm threshold, and send alarm signal to Control Panel at the same time.</p&gt <p&gtRestore Factory Settings - press the anti-tamper switch for 6 times within 2.5 seconds to restore factory settings.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtEnter the Inclusion Mode of the gateway, and press the tamper switch 3 times within 1.5s, then the Smoke Sensor will stay in enrolment state until successfully enrolled into network enrolment time out after 30s.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtEnter the Exclusion Mode of the gateway, and press the tamper switch 3 times within 1.5s, then the Smoke Sensor will be removed after period of time.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtWakeup Information</h2&gt<p&gta) Manual Wake-up - Quickly press tamper switch once, the Smoke Sensor will automatically send wake-up information, and there will be 10s after wake-up to receive gateway setting information.</p&gt <p&gtb) Automatic Wake-up - Default time of automatic wake-up is 24 hours, and there will be 10s after wake-up to receive gateway setting information. The max automatic report time = 24 hours, minimum = 30 min.</p&gt

parameter.name: config_1_1
parameter.label: 1: Basic Set
parameter.description: send BASIC Set = Value command<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtIf there is any device in Association Group 2 the PIR Sensor will send BASIC Set = Value command to control that deivce when the PIR is triggered.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_2_1
parameter.label: 2: Turn Off Light Time Configuration
parameter.description: send BASIC Set = Value command &amp; send Basic Set = 0x00 to turn of light<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtIf there is any device in Association Group 2 the PIR Sensor will send BASIC Set = Value command to Group 2 and send Basic Set = 0x00 to turn of light after 5 x t seconds- Set value t means to send the BAsic Set command after t seconds.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_3_1
parameter.label: 3: PIR Sensor Alarm Elemination Time Configuration
parameter.description: Value * 5s<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtMin time is 5s. Eg If the config is 1, this means it will eliminate alarm after 1 * 5s = 5 seconds</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: group_1
parameter.label: 1: Lifeline
parameter.description: Send "notification_Report" to the device in Life line group

parameter.name: group_2
parameter.label: 2: Basic Set Command
parameter.description: <br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtWhen sensor is triggered:</p&gt <p&gt[Command Class BAsic, Basic Set, Value = 0xFF(default 0xFF, configurable, see Config Parameters)</p&gt <p&gtWhen light up timeout:</p&gt <p&gt[Command Class BAsic, BAsic Set, Value =0x00]</p&gt
